section.title: Configuration options
section.para:
The following table lists the available configuration options of the TYPO3CR: TYPO3CR configuration options
Option path
Description
TYPO3CR: storage: backend
The storage backend used by the CR. Currently only a PDO-based backend is available.
TYPO3CR: storage: backendOptions
An array with backend options. The options depend on the backend used.
TYPO3CR: search: backend
The search backend used by the CR. Currently only a PDO-based backend is available.
TYPO3CR: search: backendOptions
An array with backend options. The options depend on the backend used

The following table lists the available configuration options of the TYPO3CR PDO storage and search backends: TYPO3CR PDO storage and search backend configuration options
Option name
Description
dataSourceName
A regular PDO DSN to use for connecting to the database.
username
The username to use for the connection, optional.
password
The password to use for the connection, optional.
